welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Eonyang, a charming city known for its beautiful mountains and rich cultural heritage. Get ready to discover its hidden gems and immerse yourself in its vibrant atmosphere. Enjoy your stay and have a delightful time exploring all that Eonyang has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ulsan Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Ulsan Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all international flights at Gimhae Airport.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic flights at Gimhae Airport.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free WiFi network by selecting 'Gimhae Airport Free WiFi' and entering their email address.
